title: Holy shit top lane morgana is literally more cancer than lissandra and nid combined
body: she is impossible to gank if she wards properly and know how  to use her stuff. Impossible to teamfight against. All she need is zhonya/book/deathcap and you lose instantly. Flash r in teamfights and 100-50 your backline from just pressing r and everyone is forced to flash away and you just lose because morg is op

replies.body:

That's every player in every lane ever. That's how valuable wards are. Morgana is far from special.
So after she spends 10k gold she does a lot of damage?  Damn that sounds unfair.
its unfair when her ult is point n click dmg

> [{quoted}](name=LangMo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Eu92KtVb,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2015-03-04T00:26:40.503+0000)

> 
> 2. If you think ganking a morgana is easy then i dont even know what to say

As a jungler, yes that's exactly what I think, her bind is incredibly predictable and slowest skill shot in the game. If you're anticipating it, it is easy to dodge. She has a black shield, but she's so squishy, that doesn't even matter. if she misses her bind, in most cases, she's dead in a solo lane.
I think you have ganking confused with tower-diving. It's suicide to tower-dive a good Morgana player, but not to get behind her when she's extended and kill her.
It's an aoe around her with a delay. You obviously never played Morgana...
Then you realize Top Morgana is the same as Mid Morgana, except with less kill potential on average as top laners tend to be less squishy than mid lane picks.

Really Morg mid isn't bad, It's a very safe lane that can easily wave clear and push if you are in a match you otherwise have trouble with, I know she's my go to whenever I see something like Zed/Leblanc who's mobility and burst are brutal or Xerith who's just got so much range you may as well forget about fighting him.  She may not be the best pick for it but I wouldn't say she's a bad one.  There is also nothing better than watching a Lee Sin pull all his dashy non-sense just to ult a black shield and look silly sitting in a binding as you calmly walk past him.

Skuttle is too OP too. 
Riot, nerf Skuttle.
Morgana is ungankable in every lane. Her Blackshield lasts 5 seconds. Top isn't different from mid asides from range advantage. Nida is ten times worse IMO.

Morgana is vulnerable to counterpicks, bro. Talon, for one, absolutely destroys her.
